thread.title: Keith Golinski, who lost granddaughters and daughter-in-law to house fire, calls for mandatory photoelectric alarms
thread.title_full: Keith Golinski, who lost granddaughters and daughter-in-law to house fire, calls for mandatory photoelectric alarms - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Keith Golinski, who lost granddaughters and daughter-in-law to house fire, calls for mandatory photoelectric alarms
text: A Queensland man whose three granddaughters and daughter-in-law died in a house fire backs calls for photoelectric alarms to be made mandatory, saying ionisation alarms are not as effective. ...
